featured.text: E. Eddie My childhood memory of a polar bear pacing back and forth in a very small space in a zoo keeps haunting me.

definition.zh_def: 埃迪（Eddie）是一個常見的男性名字，通常是愛德華（Edward）或愛德（Ed）等名字的暱稱。
definition.en_def: Eddie is a common male given name, often a diminutive of Edward or Ed.
definition.example: Eddie loves to play basketball with his friends.
